import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import productData from '../../data/ProductData'; import productsAll from '../../data/ProductsAll'; import './ProductDetail.css'; function ProductDetail() { const { productId } = useParams(); const product = productData.find(p => p.id === parseInt(productId)); const [currentIndex, setCurrentIndex] = useState(0); const itemsPerPage = 4; // Show 4 cards by default if (!product) { return
Product not found
; } const relatedProducts = productsAll.filter( (relatedProduct) => relatedProduct.id !== product.id ); const handleNext = () => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => prevIndex + itemsPerPage < relatedProducts.length ? prevIndex + itemsPerPage : prevIndex ); }; const handlePrev = () => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => prevIndex - itemsPerPage >= 0 ? prevIndex - itemsPerPage : prevIndex ); }; const visibleProducts = relatedProducts.slice( currentIndex, currentIndex + itemsPerPage ); return (
Home / Gaming /

{product.name}

{product.name}

{product.reviews}

{product.stockStatus}

${product.price}

{product.description}

Colors:

{product.delivery}
{product.postalCode}
{product.return}

{product.returnPolicy}Details

Related Items

{visibleProducts.map((relatedProduct, index) => (

{relatedProduct.name}

${relatedProduct.price}

{relatedProduct.rating}

 {relatedProduct.color && ( )}
))}
); } export default ProductDetail;
